attributes.action: Stop the increase of 20% of NI and VAT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think this is outrages, i first heard the bad news on the radio and laughed at it, and thought why on earth should the good hearted memebers of public help get parliment out of debt, its there fault that this country is in this state! why should our wages decrease to help the goverment especially when the price of living is increasing all the time.
